FuncDef:
The undo bfd command deletes a specified BFD session and cancels the binding between a BFD session and a peer IP address.
By default, the binding between a BFD session and a peer address is not deleted.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BFD session.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI] bfd test bind peer-ip 10.1.1.1 interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0 one-arm-echo
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The undo bfd command deletes a specified BFD session and cancels the binding between a BFD session and a peer IP address.
